sentences: Me tantsisime kogu öö läbi klubis.
Kas sa tantsid mind homme tantsule?
context: The Estonian word 'tantsida' means 'to dance'. It is the infinitive form of the verb. In Estonian, this follows a regular conjugation pattern for -da ending verbs. The word appears in both transitive and intransitive contexts - it can mean dancing with someone (as shown in some dictionary examples) or simply the act of dancing itself.
